name: Polished version of Vault 55 - Brief 4 by Ratima
name_original: Polished version of Vault 55 - Brief 4 by Ratima
description:
CONTROL: 

MOVEMENT: WASD 

JUMP: SPACEBAR

QUIT GAME: ESC BUTTON (only for main map)

DESCRIPTION

This project is made specifically for an assignment at SAE PERTH. 

The project have been developed in Unreal engine. 

Please note that This project is showing the polished version of a partial of  Vault 55 level. 

The file MainMap is the vault 55 level itself. 

The file AssetMap is the asset showcase level. 

I have used some free models from Unreal Marketplace and some from www.models-resource.com/

full list of the used resources can be found in the design document. 

You can read the design document of Vault 55 >> Here <<

You can submit feedback for this project >>Here<<

Thank you 

Ratima :)
